topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53e978d36368725f45630100#post_53e978d36368725f45630100
[bq="QuasarNova"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53e9786b63687265c6880100#post_53e9786b63687265c6880100

What the fuck is wrong with everyone dude?[/bq]
Cause of the "RTFM" mentality promotes lazy self-important dumbasses who couldn't think their way out of a paper bag.

If you don't know what "RTFM" stands for it stands for "read the fucking manual".  The reason why these people are idiots is that it promotes what I like to call "durr hurr I read the book so I r teh smarts".  To use a analogy one person I know in the class is in data forensics and I asked him one day essentially "Yo; why not use pattern recognition to predict crimes" and he gave me a look of durr hurr failing to recognize what higher brain functions were.  What I mean by this is let's say a criminal commits burglary at 1am in the first house on a street; next night he commits burglary at 1am at the second house on the street; there's a high chances he's going to commit burglary at the third house on the street.  If all you know is how to read a book then that's literally all you know; if all you know is what a book says then you're not getting anything out of it really.  If the sole thing you took out of math class was that 2+2=4 and didn't use any level of brain function to realize the patter than to that person 3+3 would equal 4 still.

Tl:dr; people need to learn to use their fecking brain.

topics.body:
Also you guys should check this picture out, its part of a light novel series from Japan called Rune Trooper, which is where the JSDF send a ship into a fantasy world to explore it, I think it was part of a manga spin off I'm not sure. But its an interesting themed kind of story.

http://gelbooru.com/index.php?page=post&s=view&id=1942283
Here's the pic.

I've been trying to figure out how to make a story world of modern humanity making contact with a fantasy world reality and having all kinds of adventures and stuff. My plan was to make something similar.
